meanings.definition: Situated or occurring within the walls of a structure or institution.
meanings.sent1: The intramurally located library is easily accessible to all students.
meanings.sent2: The intramurally built garden adds beauty to the school campus.
meanings.sent3: The intramurally placed vending machine always tempts hungry students.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were intramurally confined, never venturing beyond the school walls.
meanings.sent5: The intramurally painted murals brightened up the otherwise dull hallway.

meanings.definition: Involving competition or activities within a single organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The intramurally organized chess tournament was a hit among the students.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in intramurally held debates within the school.
meanings.sent3: The intramurally contested spelling bee brought out the competitive spirit in everyone.
meanings.sent4: Their intramurally played soccer match ended in a thrilling tie.
meanings.sent5: Participating in the intramurally conducted quiz was both fun and challenging.
